attributes.action: Visa extension for international students graduating in year 2020.
attributes.additional_details: It's particularly no one's fault that we are dealing with such bad time, but if you consider the condition of international students passing in year 2020 is worst. We made this big decision of studying in UK and invested our time and money, but factors like Coronavirus has already cut so many opportunities for students, also a fortunate event  of Visa extension for students passing in year 2021 has made students passing this year very bad and cut too many opportunities for us.
attributes.background:
I want government to extend Visa for students passing in year 2020.
This is the only right thing to do for international students passing this year. 
Students should get fair chance of getting job opportunities as it should be after paying huge amount of tuition fees and investing valuable time.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Extended Visas indefinitely for International Students: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/304442

Extend proposed Graduate visa route to 2019-20 batch of students due to COVID19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/314710
